channel.title: MoparScape on Vista
channel.description:
I've tryed running mopar on my vista computer for along time now, still failing to load.
It comes up then automatically shuts itself down again.
any ideas if Mopar is compatible with Vista? or is there a way to make it work.
Thanks, Vex.
